object.name: promoteChatMember
object.description: Use this method to promote or demote a user in a supergroup or a channel. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Pass False for all boolean parameters to demote a user. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to promote or demote a user in a supergroup or a channel. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Pass False for all boolean parameters to demote a user. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to promote or demote a user in a supergroup or a channel. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Pass :code:`False` for all boolean parameters to demote a user. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.name: is_anonymous

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can access the chat event log, get boost list, see hidden supergroup and channel members, report spam messages and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege.
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can access the chat event log, get boost list, see hidden supergroup and channel members, report spam messages and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can access the chat event log, get boost list, see hidden supergroup and channel members, report spam messages and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege.
annotations.name: can_manage_chat

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.name: can_delete_messages

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.name: can_manage_video_chats

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members, or access supergroup statistics
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members, or access supergroup statistics
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members, or access supergroup statistics
annotations.name: can_restrict_members

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by him)
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by him)
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by him)
annotations.name: can_promote_members

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can change chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can change chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can change chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.name: can_change_info

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can invite new users to the chat
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can invite new users to the chat
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can invite new users to the chat
annotations.name: can_invite_users

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can post stories to the chat
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can post stories to the chat
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can post stories to the chat
annotations.name: can_post_stories

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can edit stories posted by other users, post stories to the chat page, pin chat stories, and access the chat's story archive
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can edit stories posted by other users, post stories to the chat page, pin chat stories, and access the chat's story archive
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can edit stories posted by other users, post stories to the chat page, pin chat stories, and access the chat's story archive
annotations.name: can_edit_stories

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can delete stories posted by other users
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can delete stories posted by other users
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can delete stories posted by other users
annotations.name: can_delete_stories

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can post messages in the channel, or access channel statistics; for channels only
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can post messages in the channel, or access channel statistics; for channels only
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the administrator can post messages in the channel, or access channel statistics; for channels only

annotations.description: Pass True if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; for channels only
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; for channels only

annotations.description: Pass True if the user is allowed to create, rename, close, and reopen forum topics; for supergroups only
